name: Long Long Train
description:
This Game is for the Jam: "Tu juego a Juicio Jam" from Alva Majo

Have you ever seen a long long train?

Challege yourself in this bizarre adventure on board of the Long Long Train from the future!

Play 3 microgames:

  • Long Pong
    • The classic game now with a twist: A very long ball!
  • Long Cat
    • Stretch this hungry cat and whatch out with the saw!
  • Long DartBoard
    • Try to hit the target with this long dartboard

All microgames are controlled with the mouse
